entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
